name: Doping In Space (2D Platformer)
description:
This is a 2D Platformer by Jack Rockwood

The major modifications from the tutorial version are as follows:

1. 3 new levels all of original design

2. 2 new powerups that give the player enhanced abilities 

      - Original Art

      - 3 scripts written by me

3. Original enemy design with the pink cyclops blobs
